name: Subspace Network
introduce: Subspace Network is a layer zero protocol that is fully interoperable with any layer one, allowing it to serve as an infrastructure layer for the entire Web3 ecosystem. Subspace is powered by Proof-of-Archival-Storage (PoAS) consensus, which provides a permanent, scalable, decentralized storage solution. Subspace will empower builders to unlock the next wave of crypto adoption by supporting NFTs, GameFi, and the Metaverse at Internet scale.
